mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO atcoder_user_contest SET atcoder_id = #{atcoderId}, contest_name_en = #{contestNameEn}, is_rated = #{isRated}, place = #{place}, old_rating = #{oldRating}, new_rating = #{newRating}, performance = #{performance}, contest_type = #{contestType}, contest_screen_name = #{contestScreenName}, contest_name = #{contestName}, end_time = #{endTime}
